basic_info.description:
I am a passionate backend developer with experience in healthtech industry. I specialize in writing clean, scalable, and maintainable code while thriving in collaborative environments.
 My experience has allowed me to refine my technical expertise and professional skills under the guidance of an excellent team, where I have embraced best programming practices, design patterns and software architecture.
 While I have some experience in front-end development, my true passion lies in backend engineering. I excel in problem-solving, proactively seeking solutions, and identifying opportunities for improvement with a critical mindset. Additionally, I have a strong ability to communicate complex ideas clearly and effectively.
 As a continuous learner, I am always eager to expand my knowledge and adapt to emerging technologies and industry trends.

projects.title: Pokemon-App
projects.description: Creation of a SPA (Single Page Application), with a "Pokemon" theme, which on the one hand brings information from an API, and on the other hand has a database through which the user can create, edit or delete his own pokemons. The app allows you to search, filter, sort and add different pokemons to favorites.

projects.title: Work-App
projects.description: Elaboration with a 6 members work team of a web page which objective is to connect people who offer services on a small scale (such as carpentry, construction, etc.), with potential clients, facilitating and accelerating the possibility both of being hired and to  find a worker who matches my needs. The user can post service requests, contact convenient workers, offer their services to other requesting users, receive job alerts, among others.

contact.title: My networks
contact.description: If you want to talk to me about any proposal, project, or just say hello, I would be delighted to hear you. Simply fill out the form and send me an email.
contact.description2: If you prefer to contact me by other means, or simply know more about me, contact me through my networks or WhatsApp. It will be a pleasure!
